title: Imac no sound
message: Have 2 imac 21.5 and 27 for gpu replacment. After that both without sound. Both chime and has sound on external speakers. Any idea?

title: Imac no sound
message: Yes, thats right. When plug external speakers all works and slider appear.

title: Imac no sound
message: Jack detect is not working. Either bad audio jack or damaged connector/cable.

title: Imac no sound
message: Is there any way to disable jack and enable internal speakers?

title: Imac no sound
message: If I had any clue as to which boards these were, but probably the same trick as R6805 on 3115 boards.
